TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TypeFilterLevel extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 .NET Framework Remoting 之自動還原序列化 (Deserialization) 的層級。

span.span: Specifies the level of automatic deserialization for .NET Framework remoting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 低 」 和 「 完整.NET framework 遠端處理會提供兩種自動還原序列化，層級。.NET Framework remoting provides two levels of automatic deserialization, Low and Full. 低的還原序列化層級可以協助保護攻擊，還原序列化還原序列化的最基本的遠端處理功能與相關聯的型別。The Low deserialization level helps protect against deserialization attacks by deserializing only the types associated with the most basic remoting functionality. 完整的還原序列化層級支援自動還原序列化所有類型的遠端執行功能支援在所有情況下。The Full deserialization level supports automatic deserialization of all types that remoting supports in all situations. 如需.NET Framework 遠端處理類型的低和完整的支援，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b)。For a list of the .NET Framework remoting types that Low and Full support, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b). 以程式設計方式或使用應用程式組態檔，您可以設定這個列舉型別的成員。You can set the members of this enumeration programmatically or by using an application configuration file. 如需範例，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b)。For examples, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/313a0e88-5b2b-4a17-8391-0ddf9f7a787b). > [!CAUTION] > 請不要假設控制還原序列化是您應用程式所需的唯一安全性。Do not assume that controlling deserialization is the only security your application requires. 在分散式應用程式，即使較高程度的序列化控制可能無法防止惡意用戶端攔截此通訊，並使用它在某些方面，即使只顯示資料給其他使用者。In distributed applications, even a high degree of control over serialization might not prevent malicious clients from intercepting the communication and using it in some way, even if that is merely showing data to others. 因此，雖然低還原序列化層級提供保護，以免遭受特定類型的自動還原序列化為基礎的攻擊，但是您必須仍評估是否要使用驗證和加密來協助保護的機密您資料。Therefore, although the Low deserialization level provides some protection against certain types of attack based upon automatic deserialization, you must still evaluate whether to use authentication and encryption to help protect the confidentiality of your data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel Full = int32(3)

summary.span: .NET Framework Remoting 的完整還原序列化層級。

span.span: The full deserialization level for .NET Framework remoting.

summary.span: 在所有情況下它都支援遠端處理所支援的所有類型。

span.span: It supports all types that remoting supports in all situations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.TypeFilterLevel Low = int32(2)

summary.span: .NET Framework Remoting 的低還原序列化層級。

span.span: The low deserialization level for .NET Framework remoting.

summary.span: 它支援與基本遠端處理功能關聯的類型。

span.span: It supports types associated with basic remoting functionality.
